Root.title: bray Fit
Root.description: Web application for planning and monitoring training

hero.title: be healthy, be strong, be fitness
hero.description: People don't lack strength, they lack determination!

about.title: Stay on Track with Customized Routines

goals.title: Set Goals
goals.description: Define your fitness objectives and let the app suggest tailored workout plans.

build.title: Build Routines
build.description: Easily create and save custom routines using our extensive exercise library.

consistent.title: Stay Consistent
consistent.description: Receive helpful reminders and track your progress to stay motivated and on track.

callToAction.title: This is your story!
callToAction.description: Believe in yourself and there will come a day when others will have no choice but to believe with you.

WorkoutSchedule.title: My workout schedule
WorkoutSchedule.description: Track your progress and plan your workouts

MyWeight.title: My weight
MyWeight.totalLossTooltip: The current value shows the variation of the data over time, compared to the first measurement.
MyWeight.lastLossTooltip: The current value shows the variation of the data over time, compared to the last measurement.

RestDuration.title: Rest duration
RestDuration.description: Track your rest time between sets

ExercisingMuscleGroups.title: Exercising muscle groups
ExercisingMuscleGroups.description: Select the muscle groups you want to work on in your routine.

WorkoutDuration.title: Workout duration
WorkoutDuration.description: Set the duration of your workout.

Assessment.title: Assessment
Assessment.description: Complete the assessment to get a personalized training plan.

banner.title: Necessary assessment
banner.description: In order to create personalized routines, you need to answer a few short questions.

options.weight&height:height:title: Height (cm)
options.training:T23X: Entrené de 2x a 3x a la semana
options.training:T4+X: Entrené 4x a más a la semana

options.gym:GY3T: He ido a un gimnasio y sé cómo entrenar

Workout.empty: Content is not available at this time

pwa.title: App available!
pwa.description: Install the app on your device.

acceptcookies.message: We use cookies for essential website functions and to better understand how you use our site, so we can create the best possible experience for you.
